### Derivatives in R

```{r}
fx = expression(3.1 * (x^4) - 28 * x) 
df_dx <- D(fx, "x") # expression and the variable in ""
df_dx

x <- 10

eval(df_dx) # slope at x = 10
```

##### Slope of g(z) = 2z^3^ - 10.5z^2^ + 4.1 at z = 3.6

```{r}
gz = expression((2 * z^3) - (10.5 * z^2) + 4.1)
dg_dz <- D(gz, "z")
dg_dz

z = 3.6
 
eval(dg_dz)

```

##### Over a sequence of values
```{r}
z = seq(1, 3, length = 20)
eval(dg_dz)  

```
